known_issues: On mobile in the model builder, the tool palette button is not visible while scrolling through zones, making it hard to add tools.

existing_features.title: Update the Model Builder mobile layout so the Tool Palette access button remains visible and tappable while the user scrolls through the Narrative / Framework / Execution zones (e.g., by making the Tool Palette trigger sticky or a floating action button).

Ensure the always-accessible Tool Palette trigger visually indicates when a tool is currently selected for placement, and provide an always-accessible way to cancel placement mode on mobile when a tool is selected.

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve mobile model builder UX by keeping the tool palette button always accessible (e.g., make it sticky while scrolling through zones)

projectName: Make Model Builder Tool Palette button always accessible on mobile while scrolling zones
